name: Degens from Upgalaxy
description: Never underestimate a degenerate from the upper galaxy to get down and dirty in the Kuiper Asteroid belt. Using the onboard Electromagnetic field, these skids  are breaking into the illegal salvage game. Collect asteroids, return them to the Disposal Unit managing Parallel Storage to Exacting Regulations (D.U.M.P.S.T.E.R.) and try not to get yourself blow'd up.
